abstract: Contrarily to what happens with the Epstein–Nesbet (EN) zeroth-order Hamiltonian, the Møller–Plesset (MP) perturbation operator has diagonal matrix elements, the expression of which is recalled. It...
author: Malrieu, Jean-Paul and Angeli, Celestino
keywords: Møller–Plesset perturbation theory; Epstein–Nesbet perturbation theory; divergences in perturbation theory; linked cluster theorem; coupled cluster
title: The Møller–Plesset perturbation revisited: origin of high-order divergences
